HSCv2: select * from dbo.SearchDetailedCatalog({0}, {1}, {2}, 0) order by det desc, 2,3,4
GALEX_GR6Plus7: SELECT 60 * n.distance, o.ra, o.dec, nuv_mag, nuv_magerr, fuv_mag, fuv_magerr from dbo.fGetNearbyObjEq({0}, {1}, {2} / 60.) n join PhotoObjAll o on o.objid = n.objid where primary_flag = 1 order by 1
